com.opera.core.systems.scope

Interface Service

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConsoleLogger, CookieManager, Core, Debugger, DesktopUtils, DesktopWindowManager, Ecmascript, EcmascriptDebugger, Exec, Prefs, Selftest, SystemInput, WindowManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEcmascriptService, AbstractService, MockEcmascriptDebugger, ScopeConsoleLogger, ScopeCookieManager, ScopeCore, ScopeDesktopUtils, ScopeDesktopWindowManager, ScopeEcmascriptDebugger, ScopeEcmascriptDebugger6, ScopeEcmascriptService, ScopeExec, ScopePrefs, ScopeSelftest, ScopeSystemInputManager, ScopeWindowManager

    public interface Service
    Represents a Scope service in Opera.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getServiceName()
      Gets the name of the service as represented in Opera.
      String getServiceVersion()
      Gets the current version of the service.
      void init()
      Initialize the service.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
        Initialize the service.

      • getServiceName

        String getServiceName()
        Gets the name of the service as represented in Opera.
        Returns:
        the name of the service, as represented in Opera

      • getServiceVersion

        String getServiceVersion()
        Gets the current version of the service. Versions are defined as "X.Y", where X is the major version, and Y the minor version.
        Returns:
        the current version of the service
